DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim determine accuracy CAP quantification liver steatosis use liver biopsy reference . Secondarily , investigator correlate transient elastography ( TE ) CAP result , analyze possible association CAP/TE post-liver transplant ( LT ) clinical outcome , evaluate change CAP LT . The study aim include many donor need achieve 100 transplant liver allograft .
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Attenuation Parameter ( CAP ) Liver Allografts
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Liver Recipient Men woman , Age 18years old 80years old inclusive Inclusion criterion Liver Donor Valid TE Fibroscan 530/502 , define : At least 10 valid measurement IQR/Median stiffness value < 30 % ( case > 7.1 kPa ) Exclusion criterion Liver Recipient Patient undergo liver transplantation Exclusion criterion Liver Donor Donation circulatory death ( DCD ) Donor receive vasoactive amine ALT AST > 300 No liver biopsy obtain organ procurement process
